item.title: Help with ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights >=2) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“localhost”)) {
sendMessage(“You can not IP ban the owner!”);
}
else {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToIp(victim);
}
}

[/code]

i get this error

client.java:10113: ')' expected if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase("localhost")) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
how do i fix/
